mapper.insert: insert into review(type, user_no, video_no, content, reg_datetime, update_datetime, review_no) VALUES (#{type}, #{user_no}, #{video_no}, #{content}, now(), now(), #{review_no})
mapper.select: select * from review where video_no = #{video_no} and review_no = 0
select count(*) from review where video_no = #{video_no} and review_no = 0
